===Etymology===
Duplication of {{m|ja|代|tr=dai, yo||[[generation]]}}. Compare {{cog|zh|代代}}, {{cog|vi|đời đời}}.

====Usage notes====
* ''daidai'' is a more common pronunciation than ''yoyo''.
* {{lang|ja|代代}} and {{ja-l|代々}} are both commonly used, and more so than {{ja-l|世世}} and {{ja-l|世々}}.
